languages.text: Эти мечи принадлежали дерзкому губернатору Веабос-6, поднявшему восстание столетия назад. Кисти мятежника, сохраненные нетленными, все еще покоятся на рукоятях клинков.

traits.locale_text: Пара мечей, принадлежавших капитану и мученику Херману Лучегу, отважно принявшему бой с эскадрой еретиков, сразившему их лидера в схватке и принявшему жестокую смерть от рук богохульников.

languages.text: These swords belonged to a presumptuous governor of Vheabos VI who staged a revolt hundreds of years ago. The insurrectionist's hands, preserved against decay, still rest on the swords' hilts.
languages.original_text: Эти мечи принадлежали дерзкому губернатору Веабос-6, поднявшему восстание столетия назад. Кисти мятежника, сохраненные нетленными, все еще покоятся на рукоятях клинков.

traits.locale_text: These swords belonged to a brazen governor of Vheabos-VI who staged a revolt hundreds of years ago. The insurgent's hands, preserved from decay, still rest on the swords' hilts.
These swords belonged to a brazen governor of Vheabos-VI who staged a revolt hundreds of years ago. The insurgent's hands, preserved from decay, still rest on the swords' hilts.
These swords belonged to a presumptuous governor of Vheabos-VI who staged a revolt hundreds of years ago. The insurrectionist's hands, preserved against decay, still rest on the swords' hilts.
These swords belonged to a presumptuous governor of Vheabos-VI who staged a revolt hundreds of years ago. The insurrectionist's hands, preserved against decay, still rest on the swords' hilts.
These swords belonged to a presumptuous governor of Vheabos VI who staged a revolt hundreds of years ago. The insurrectionist's hands, preserved against decay, still rest on the swords' hilts.

languages.text: 这些剑曾属于某位几百年前在维博斯六号星发动叛乱的傲慢总督。那个叛乱者的手依然搭在剑柄上，这么多年都被保存了下来，没有腐烂。
languages.original_text: These swords belonged to a presumptuous governor of Vheabos VI who staged a revolt hundreds of years ago. The insurrectionist's hands, preserved against decay, still rest on the swords' hilts.

traits.locale_text: 这些剑曾属于某位几百年前在维博斯六号星发动叛乱的傲慢总督。那个叛乱者的手依然搭在剑柄上，这么多年都被保存了下来，没有腐烂。

languages.text: Estas espadas pertenecieron a un presuntuoso gobernador de Vheabos VI que organizó una revuelta hace siglos. Las manos del rebelde, conservadas para evitar la descomposición, aún reposan sobre las empuñaduras.
languages.original_text: These swords belonged to a presumptuous governor of Vheabos VI who staged a revolt hundreds of years ago. The insurrectionist's hands, preserved against decay, still rest on the swords' hilts.

traits.locale_text: Estas espadas pertenecieron a un presuntuoso gobernador de Vheabos-VI que organizó una revuelta hace siglos. Las manos del rebelde, conservadas para evitar la descomposición, aún reposan sobre las empuñaduras.

languages.text: これらの剣は、数百年前に反乱を起こしたヴィアボス・VIの図々しい総督が持っていたものだ。反乱軍の武器は朽ちることなく保存されて、今も柄の中に収まっている。
languages.original_text: These swords belonged to a presumptuous governor of Vheabos VI who staged a revolt hundreds of years ago. The insurrectionist's hands, preserved against decay, still rest on the swords' hilts.

traits.locale_text: これらの剣は、数百年前に反乱を起こしたヴィアボス・VIの図々しい総督が持っていたものだ。反乱軍の武器は朽ちることなく保存されて、今も柄の中に収まっている。

languages.text: Diese Schwerter gehörten einem überheblichen Gouverneur von Vheabos VI, der vor Hunderten von Jahren eine Revolte anzettelte. Die Hände der Aufständischen wurden vor dem Verrotten bewahrt und liegen noch immer auf den Griffen der Waffen.
languages.original_text: These swords belonged to a presumptuous governor of Vheabos VI who staged a revolt hundreds of years ago. The insurrectionist's hands, preserved against decay, still rest on the swords' hilts.

traits.locale_text: Diese Schwerter gehörten einem überheblichen Gouverneur von Vheabos-VI, der vor Hunderten von Jahren eine Revolte anzettelte. Die Hände der Aufständischen wurden vor dem Verrotten bewahrt und liegen noch immer auf den Griffen der Waffen.

languages.text: Ces épées appartenaient à un gouverneur de Vhéabos-VI un peu trop présomptueux à l'origine d'une révolte, il y a plusieurs siècles. Les mains de l'insurgé, préservées de la décomposition, agrippent encore les poignées des lames.
languages.original_text: These swords belonged to a presumptuous governor of Vheabos VI who staged a revolt hundreds of years ago. The insurrectionist's hands, preserved against decay, still rest on the swords' hilts.

traits.locale_text: Ces épées appartenaient à un gouverneur de Vheabos-VI un peu trop présomptueux à l'origine d'une révolte, il y a plusieurs siècles. Les mains de l'insurgé, préservées de la décomposition, agrippent encore les poignées des lames.

languages.text: Bu kılıçlar, Vheabos VI'nın yüzlerce yıl önce bir başkaldırıya önayak olmuş, haddini bilmez bir valisine ait. İsyancının çürümesi engellenmiş elleri hâlâ kılıcın kabzasını kavrıyor.
languages.original_text: These swords belonged to a presumptuous governor of Vheabos VI who staged a revolt hundreds of years ago. The insurrectionist's hands, preserved against decay, still rest on the swords' hilts.

traits.locale_text: Bu kılıçlar, Vheabos VI'nın yüzlerce yıl önce bir başkaldırıya önayak olmuş, haddini bilmez bir valisine ait. İsyancının çürümesi engellenmiş elleri hâlâ kılıcın kabzasını kavrıyor.
